name: Wasted/ Потрачено
description:
Save them!

You are the ancient god and you try to save the planet. But the only instruments you have are divine retributions: the plague, the fire and the rain of frogs.

If your people will reach the rocket level you'll win.

But until it's done you have to pay lives for lives.

How to play
1. Different disasters appear on the planet. Often the disasters and cililisations are at the same place.
2. The disaster may ruin the civilisation destroing its "health points".
The longer it has problems the bigger they are.

But you can destroy the disaster with the other disaster (just drag and drop):

  • Hell Fire -- with Great Flood,
  • the Plague -- with the Rain of Frogs,
  • the Tornado -- with the Eath Quake.

3. Each action costs you several points of you divine energy, less or more.

4. If you want to fill your energy you may sacrifice half of civilisation to get more energy.

5. If the civilisation is alive it develops: from caves to rockets. 

Sorry, it's early prototype yet)

Paper game

We also have the paper game. It's not the copy or the prototype. It's the other game coming from the same idea. Come to play)
